prompts: Create a metallic dragon Pokemon with sharp edges and a sleek design.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines steel and dragon elements with a futuristic look.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience with a robust body.
Generate a Pokemon character that has a shiny, reflective surface and a unique silhouette.
Make a dragon-type Pokemon with a mix of gray and blue colors and angular features.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a futuristic robot dragon, emphasizing metallic textures.
Give me a Pokemon that stands tall with powerful legs and a striking headcrest.
